Class BOSS

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • BOSS
  • public class BOSS
extends greenfoot.Actor
    This is the last enemy the player will fight. It has more health and shoots fire faster.
    Version:
    22.02.2021
    Author:
    Soltuzu Emanuel & Mandache Alexandru Nutu
